section.title: Known Issues in version 4.0.0
section.para: Following is a list of known issues at the time of release.

listitem.para: JBDS-1554: The new project wizards do not display their associated Eclipse perspective.
JBDS-1528: The JBDS uninstaller under Windows XP can leave some files behind.
JBDS-1226: The installation progress monitor incorrectly displays 2 / 2 when not adding a server, even though the installation is only 50% complete.
JBDS-1230: No icon is placed in the system ApplicationsProgramming Tools menu when JBDS is installed under RHEL 5.4.
JBDS-1266: The credentials used when testing the jBPM deployment process are cached, and are used in place of any additional credentials that are specifed.
JBDS-1519: The "Could not initialize NSS" error is generated by the Visual Editor.
JBDS-1509: JDBS thread can get caught in a loop when interacting with the new connection profile process.
